item.description: We will continue with the 4th book of volume one of The World as Will and Representation. Please remember that this time around we plan to cover only volume one (4 books plus an appendix of criticism of Kantian philosophy). So probably one more meeting on Schopenhauer before we plan to move on.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the philosophy group from the staff.
item.name: Schopenhauer: The World as Will and Representation IV
